deploy.startCommand: bash -lc "cd /app && pwd && ls -la && echo 'Creating .env file...' && cp .env.example .env && echo 'Updating .env with correct database path...' && sed -i 's|DB_DATABASE=.*|DB_DATABASE=/app/database/database.sqlite|' .env && echo 'Creating directories...' && mkdir -p storage/framework/{cache,sessions,views} bootstrap/cache database && echo 'Creating database...' && touch database/database.sqlite && chmod 666 database/database.sqlite && ls -la database/database.sqlite && echo 'Database created, running migrations...' && php artisan key:generate --force && php artisan migrate --force && echo 'Seeding database with admin account...' && php artisan db:seed --force && php artisan storage:link || true && php artisan config:clear && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache && echo 'Starting server...' && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT"
